markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Venomed Tongue](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1810)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 305</row>

**Price** 333 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

**Access** Followers of Abraxas from Nex have access to this tattoo.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Secrets must be unraveled, no matter how painful. This tattoo of braided tongues provides a +1 item bonus to Deception checks.
